verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֧ר <WH1696> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh unto Moses וְאֶֽל־ <WH413> ve-'el- and to אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron and to Aaron לֵאמֹ֥ר <WH559> le-Mor saying אֲלֵהֶֽם׃ <WH413> 'a-le-Hem. about

דַּבְּר֛וּ <WH1696> dab-be-Ru Speak אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> le-Mor; saying זֹ֤את <WH2063> zot These הַֽחַיָּה֙ <WH2416> ha-chai-Yah [are] the beasts אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which תֹּאכְל֔וּ <WH398> to-che-Lu, which ye shall eat מִכָּל־ <WH3605> mik-kol all הַבְּהֵמָ֖ה <WH929> hab-be-he-Mah among all the beasts אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- are on הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ha-'A-retz. that [are] on the earth

כֹּ֣ל׀ <WH3605> kol Whatever מַפְרֶ֣סֶת <WH6536> maf-Re-set Whatsoever parteth פַּרְסָ֗ה <WH6541> par-Sah, the hoof וְשֹׁסַ֤עַת <WH8156> ve-sho-Sa-'at making שֶׁ֙סַע֙ <WH8157> she-sa' cleft פְּרָסֹ֔ת <WH6541> pe-ra-Sot, hoofs מַעֲלַ֥ת <WH5927> ma-'a-Lat [and] cheweth גֵּרָ֖ה <WH1625> ge-Rah the cud בַּבְּהֵמָ֑ה <WH929> bab-be-he-Mah; among the beasts אֹתָ֖הּ <WH853> 'o-Tah תֹּאכֵֽלוּ׃ <WH398> to-Che-lu. that shall ye eat

אַ֤ךְ <WH389> 'ach Nevertheless אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- זֶה֙ <WH2088> zeh of these לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo are not תֹֽאכְל֔וּ <WH398> to-che-Lu, these shall ye not eat מִֽמַּעֲלֵי֙ <WH5927> mi-ma-'a-Lei of them that chew הַגֵּרָ֔ה <WH1625> hag-ge-Rah, the cud וּמִמַּפְרִיסֵ֖י <WH6536> u-mi-maf-ri-Sei or of them that divide הַפַּרְסָ֑ה <WH6541> hap-par-Sah; the hoof אֶֽת־ <WH853> 'et- הַ֠גָּמָל <WH1581> Hag-ga-mol [as] the camel כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for מַעֲלֵ֨ה <WH5927> ma-'a-Leh because he cheweth גֵרָ֜ה <WH1625> ge-Rah the cud ה֗וּא <WH1931> Hu, he וּפַרְסָה֙ <WH6541> u-far-Sah not the hoof אֵינֶ֣נּוּ <WH369> 'ei-Nen-nu does not מַפְרִ֔יס <WH6536> maf-Ris, but divideth טָמֵ֥א <WH2931> ta-Me he [is] unclean ה֖וּא <WH1931> hu he לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem.

וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַשָּׁפָ֗ן <WH8227> hash-sha-Fan, And the coney כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for מַעֲלֵ֤ה <WH5927> ma-'a-Leh because he cheweth גֵרָה֙ <WH1625> ge-Rah the cud ה֔וּא <WH1931> Hu, he וּפַרְסָ֖ה <WH6541> u-far-Sah not the hoof לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo does not יַפְרִ֑יס <WH6536> yaf-Ris; but divideth טָמֵ֥א <WH2931> ta-Me he [is] unclean ה֖וּא <WH1931> hu he לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem.

וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הָאַרְנֶ֗בֶת <WH768> ha-'ar-Ne-vet, And the hare כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for מַעֲלַ֤ת <WH5927> ma-'a-Lat because he cheweth גֵּרָה֙ <WH1625> ge-Rah the cud הִ֔וא <WH1931> hi he וּפַרְסָ֖ה <WH6541> u-far-Sah not the hoof לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo does not הִפְרִ֑יסָה <WH6536> hif-Ri-sah; but divideth טְמֵאָ֥ה <WH2931> te-me-'Ah he [is] unclean הִ֖וא <WH1931> hi he לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem.

וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַ֠חֲזִיר <WH2386> Ha-cha-zir And the swine כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for מַפְרִ֨יס <WH6536> maf-Ris though he divide פַּרְסָ֜ה <WH6541> par-Sah the hoof ה֗וּא <WH1931> Hu, thus וְשֹׁסַ֥ע <WH8156> ve-sho-Sa' making שֶׁ֙סַע֙ <WH8157> she-sa' cleft פַּרְסָ֔ה <WH6541> par-Sah, hoof וְה֖וּא <WH1931> ve-Hu he גֵּרָ֣ה <WH1625> ge-Rah not the cud לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- does not יִגָּ֑ר <WH1641> yig-Gar; yet he cheweth טָמֵ֥א <WH2931> ta-Me he [is] unclean ה֖וּא <WH1931> hu he לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem.

מִבְּשָׂרָם֙ <WH1320> mib-be-sa-Ram Of their flesh לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo nor תֹאכֵ֔לוּ <WH398> to-Che-lu, shall ye not eat וּבְנִבְלָתָ֖ם <WH5038> u-ve-niv-la-Tam and their carcase לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo nor תִגָּ֑עוּ <WH5060> tig-Ga-'u; shall ye not touch טְמֵאִ֥ים <WH2931> te-me-'Im they [are] unclean הֵ֖ם <WH1992> hem like לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem.

אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- זֶה֙ <WH2088> zeh These תֹּֽאכְל֔וּ <WH398> to-che-Lu, These shall ye eat מִכֹּ֖ל <WH3605> mik-Kol all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher after בַּמָּ֑יִם <WH4325> bam-Ma-yim; of all that [are] in the waters כֹּ֣ל <WH3605> kol all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- after לוֹ֩ lo סְנַפִּ֨יר <WH5579> se-nap-Pir whatsoever hath fins וְקַשְׂקֶ֜שֶׂת <WH7193> ve-kas-Ke-set and scales בַּמַּ֗יִם <WH4325> bam-Ma-yim, in the waters בַּיַּמִּ֛ים <WH3220> bai-yam-Mim in the seas וּבַנְּחָלִ֖ים <WH5158> u-van-ne-cha-Lim and in the rivers אֹתָ֥ם <WH853> 'o-Tam תֹּאכֵֽלוּ׃ <WH398> to-Che-lu. them shall ye eat

וְכֹל֩ <WH3605> ve-Chol all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher that אֵֽין־ <WH369> 'ein- have ל֜וֹ lo סְנַפִּ֣יר <WH5579> se-nap-Pir And all that have not fins וְקַשְׂקֶ֗שֶׂת <WH7193> ve-kas-Ke-set, and scales בַּיַּמִּים֙ <WH3220> bai-yam-Mim in the seas וּבַנְּחָלִ֔ים <WH5158> u-van-ne-cha-Lim, and in the rivers מִכֹּל֙ <WH3605> mik-Kol all שֶׁ֣רֶץ <WH8318> She-retz of all that move הַמַּ֔יִם <WH4325> ham-Ma-yim, in the waters וּמִכֹּ֛ל <WH3605> u-mik-Kol all נֶ֥פֶשׁ <WH5315> Ne-fesh thing הַחַיָּ֖ה <WH2416> ha-chai-Yah and of any living אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher that בַּמָּ֑יִם <WH4325> bam-Ma-yim; which [is] in the waters שֶׁ֥קֶץ <WH8263> She-ketz they [shall be] an abomination הֵ֖ם <WH1992> hem like לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem.

וְשֶׁ֖קֶץ <WH8263> ve-She-ketz They shall be even an abomination יִהְי֣וּ <WH1961> yih-Yu become לָכֶ֑ם la-Chem; מִבְּשָׂרָם֙ <WH1320> mib-be-sa-Ram of their flesh לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo may not תֹאכֵ֔לוּ <WH398> to-Che-lu, unto you ye shall not eat וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et נִבְלָתָ֖ם <WH5038> niv-la-Tam but ye shall have their carcases תְּשַׁקֵּֽצוּ׃ <WH8262> te-shak-Ke-tzu. in abomination

כֹּ֣ל <WH3605> kol all manner אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher does not אֵֽין־ <WH369> 'ein- have ל֛וֹ lo סְנַפִּ֥יר <WH5579> se-nap-Pir Whatsoever hath no fins וְקַשְׂקֶ֖שֶׂת <WH7193> ve-kas-Ke-set nor scales בַּמָּ֑יִם <WH4325> bam-Ma-yim; in the waters שֶׁ֥קֶץ <WH8263> She-ketz that [shall be] an abomination ה֖וּא <WH1931> hu he לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem.

וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et אֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> 'el-leh These תְּשַׁקְּצ֣וּ <WH8262> te-shak-ke-Tzu And these [are they which] ye shall have in abomination מִן־ <WH4480> min- among הָע֔וֹף <WH5775> ha-'of, the fowls לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo not יֵאָכְל֖וּ <WH398> ye-'a-che-Lu they shall not be eaten שֶׁ֣קֶץ <WH8263> She-ketz they [are] an abomination הֵ֑ם <WH1992> Hem; like אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַנֶּ֙שֶׁר֙ <WH5404> han-Ne-sher the eagle וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַפֶּ֔רֶס <WH6538> hap-Pe-res, and the ossifrage וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> ve-'Et הָעָזְנִיָּֽה׃ <WH5822> ha-'a-ze-ni-Yah. and the ospray
וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַ֨דָּאָ֔ה <WH1676> had-da-'Ah, And the vulture וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הָאַיָּ֖ה <WH344> ha-'ai-Yah and the kite לְמִינָֽהּ׃ <WH4327> le-mi-Nah. after his kind
אֵ֥ת <WH853> 'et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- every עֹרֵ֖ב <WH6158> 'o-Rev Every raven לְמִינֽוֹ׃ <WH4327> le-mi-No. after his kind

וְאֵת֙ <WH853> ve-'Et בַּ֣ת <WH1323> bat first הַֽיַּעֲנָ֔ה <WH3284> hai-ya-'a-Nah, and the ostrich וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַתַּחְמָ֖ס <WH8464> hat-tach-Mas and the night hawk וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַשָּׁ֑חַף <WH7828> hash-Sha-chaf; and the cuckow וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַנֵּ֖ץ <WH5322> han-Netz and the hawk לְמִינֵֽהוּ׃ <WH4327> le-mi-Ne-hu. after his kind

וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַכּ֥וֹס <WH3563> hak-Kos And the little owl וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַשָּׁלָ֖ךְ <WH7994> hash-sha-Lach and the cormorant וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַיַּנְשֽׁוּף׃ <WH3244> hai-yan-Shuf. and the great owl

וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַתִּנְשֶׁ֥מֶת <WH8580> hat-tin-She-met And the swan וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַקָּאָ֖ת <WH6893> hak-ka-'At and the pelican וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הָרָחָֽם׃ <WH7360> ha-ra-Cham. and the gier eagle

וְאֵת֙ <WH853> ve-'Et הַחֲסִידָ֔ה <WH2624> ha-cha-si-Dah, And the stork הָאֲנָפָ֖ה <WH601> ha-'a-na-Fah the heron לְמִינָ֑הּ <WH4327> le-mi-Nah; after her kind וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַדּוּכִיפַ֖ת <WH1744> had-du-chi-Fat and the lapwing וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הָעֲטַלֵּֽף׃ <WH5847> ha-'a-tal-Lef. and the bat

כֹּ֚ל <WH3605> kol All שֶׁ֣רֶץ <WH8318> She-retz that creep הָע֔וֹף <WH5775> ha-'of, All fowls הַהֹלֵ֖ךְ <WH1980> ha-ho-Lech going עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on אַרְבַּ֑ע <WH702> 'ar-Ba'; upon [all] four שֶׁ֥קֶץ <WH8263> She-ketz [shall be] an abomination ה֖וּא <WH1931> hu he לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem. ס sa-Mek

אַ֤ךְ <WH389> 'ach Yet אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- זֶה֙ <WH2088> zeh these תֹּֽאכְל֔וּ <WH398> to-che-Lu, Yet these may ye eat מִכֹּל֙ <WH3605> mik-Kol all שֶׁ֣רֶץ <WH8318> She-retz creeping הָע֔וֹף <WH5775> ha-'of, of every flying הַהֹלֵ֖ךְ <WH1980> ha-ho-Lech thing that goeth עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on אַרְבַּ֑ע <WH702> 'ar-Ba'; upon [all] four אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which; לֹא lo כלֹ֤ו <WH3808> Lo not קכְרָעַ֙יִם֙ <WH3767> che-ra-'A-yim which have legs מִמַּ֣עַל <WH4605> mi-Ma-'al above לְרַגְלָ֔יו <WH7272> le-rag-Lav, their feet לְנַתֵּ֥ר <WH5425> le-nat-Ter to leap בָּהֵ֖ן <WH2004> ba-Hen withal עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ha-'A-retz. upon the earth

אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֵ֤לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh These מֵהֶם֙ <WH1992> me-Hem you תֹּאכֵ֔לוּ <WH398> to-Che-lu, [Even] these of them ye may eat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָֽאַרְבֶּ֣ה <WH697> ha-'ar-Beh the locust לְמִינ֔וֹ <WH4327> le-mi-No, after his kind וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַסָּלְעָ֖ם <WH5556> has-sal-'Am and the bald locust לְמִינֵ֑הוּ <WH4327> le-mi-Ne-hu; after his kind וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַחַרְגֹּ֣ל <WH2728> ha-char-Gol and the beetle לְמִינֵ֔הוּ <WH4327> le-mi-Ne-hu, after his kind וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הֶחָגָ֖ב <WH2284> he-cha-Gav and the grasshopper לְמִינֵֽהוּ׃ <WH4327> le-mi-Ne-hu. after his kind

וְכֹל֙ <WH3605> ve-Chol all שֶׁ֣רֶץ <WH8318> She-retz creeping things הָע֔וֹף <WH5775> ha-'of, But all [other] flying אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which ל֖וֹ lo אַרְבַּ֣ע <WH702> 'ar-Ba' which have four רַגְלָ֑יִם <WH7272> rag-La-yim; feet שֶׁ֥קֶץ <WH8263> She-ketz [shall be] an abomination ה֖וּא <WH1931> hu he לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem.

וּלְאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> u-le-'El-leh these תִּטַּמָּ֑אוּ <WH2930> tit-tam-Ma-'u; And for these ye shall be unclean כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- whoever הַנֹּגֵ֥עַ <WH5060> han-no-Ge-a' whosoever toucheth בְּנִבְלָתָ֖ם <WH5038> be-niv-la-Tam the carcase יִטְמָ֥א <WH2930> yit-Ma of them shall be unclean עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <WH6153> ha-'A-rev. until the even

וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and whoever הַנֹּשֵׂ֖א <WH5375> han-no-Se And whosoever beareth מִנִּבְלָתָ֑ם <WH5038> min-niv-la-Tam; [ought] of the carcase יְכַבֵּ֥ס <WH3526> ye-chab-Bes of them shall wash בְּגָדָ֖יו <WH899> be-ga-Dav his clothes וְטָמֵ֥א <WH2930> ve-ta-Me and be unclean עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <WH6153> ha-'A-rev. until the even

לְֽכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol all הַבְּהֵמָ֡ה <WH929> hab-be-he-Mah [The carcases] of every beast אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which הִוא֩ <WH1931> hi he מַפְרֶ֨סֶת <WH6536> maf-Re-set which divideth פַּרְסָ֜ה <WH6541> par-Sah the hoof וְשֶׁ֣סַע׀ <WH8156> ve-She-sa' make אֵינֶ֣נָּה <WH369> 'ei-Nen-nah else שֹׁסַ֗עַת <WH8157> sho-Sa-'at, cleft וְגֵרָה֙ <WH1625> ve-ge-Rah the cud אֵינֶ֣נָּה <WH369> 'ei-Nen-nah not מַעֲלָ֔ה <WH5927> ma-'a-Lah, nor cheweth טְמֵאִ֥ים <WH2931> te-me-'Im [are] unclean הֵ֖ם <WH1992> hem like לָכֶ֑ם la-Chem; כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- whoever הַנֹּגֵ֥עַ <WH5060> han-no-Ge-a' unto you every one that toucheth בָּהֶ֖ם ba-Hem יִטְמָֽא׃ <WH2930> yit-Ma. them shall be unclean
